segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the open cabinets first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A big cookie jar is sitting there, full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that stool, stretching to get some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, maybe to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right beside him, hand out, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cute how they're teaming up for this little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink area is a mess with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's still running, and it's flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just polishing her plate, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's getting splashed, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids better watch out on that slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's turning into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get those cookies without falling.
segments.speaker: PAR
